Title: Silverlight book viewer
Description: Silverlight book viewer allows users to find and watch books using Silverlight Deep Zoom technology. It is used for publishing antique books from Kyiv Taras Shevchenko National University's library.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Silverlight book viewer allows users to find and watch books using Silverlight Deep Zoom technology. It is used for publishing antique books from Kyiv Taras Shevchenko National University's library. Currently it is in alpha version, preview is available at http://rarebooks.univ.net.ua.
